Data Fields

GArray * rsrmgrs
 
struct sttsrv_config_s * sttsrv
 

Detailed Description

This struct is used to keep the configuration stuff retrived from config file and restricted to stuff related to the current profile. The struct is a set of pointers to data already stored in the global config
